description:
Have you ever MET a simple and confident man who loves animals and is filled with an incredible passion for life? So here I am; An intelligent and interesting person, who really wants to share everything exciting with someone good in life, in this amazing world. I am very serious in my search and I have things clear, loyalty, love and above all mutual understanding is the most important thing in a relationship. I am a generous man with great passion for details, and clear feelings.

So I describe myself as... An open-minded, generous and enterprising man! I am full of love! I always smile, even if I am in a bad mood or it is better to say that I am only in a good mood because our life is for fun and not for sadness. I like walking, the sea and nature, it is the only way to relax and be calm, the afternoons reading a book and listening to music are one of my great passions! I know how to cook and I am always willing to learn something new. I also like my job, which is design, it's very exciting, traveling to discover new places and I really hope to find my half, to be able to be part of it and want to form a good relationship. We can build what we want and what we want if we know exactly.

A few simple words for the amazing person I hope to find on this site...

I have no idea where I'm going
nor where destiny takes me from.
But I want you to be by my side.

You will be the best written page;
That my destiny has written in my life,
And now I know I was not wrong.

and without hesitation I would give you everything,
And if it didn't exist, I would invent it.

With you I want to grow old.
With you there are plenty of wishes,
I don't ask for more because you are everything I long for,
and if it's with you I'll stay

It is a privilege to have you in my life,
That just seeing you makes my day,
And forever, I want to have you.

there will be no barriers to love you,
because being together,
the universe will be in favor
and everything will be perfect.
I will enjoy your kisses
I will be a fan of your body and the passion you give me.
It will be a pleasure to have you every day in my calendar.
and everything will be easier because you will be with me my love.

Blessings
